title: Quentin Richardson on Being in the Jordan Family, His Former Beef With Paul Pierce, and More | Real Ones
description:
Quentin Richardson joins Logan and Raja to talk about what it was like growing up in Chicago during the height of Michael Jordan’s Bulls run (10:30), his past beef with Paul Pierce (15:15), adjusting to life in Los Angeles after he was drafted by the Clippers at age 19 (18:15), being a part of the Jordan family (29:30), and much more.
Hosts: Logan Murdock and Raja Bell
Guest: Quentin Richardson
